description:
Summation of all reported hours of exercise on the Current Physical Activities Questionnire.

Data from this question was collected from 2009 onward.
calculation: (Hours per Week of Walking (from #1)) + (Hours per Week of Activities Reported in Regular Exercise (#4)) + (Hours per Week of Activities Reported in Sports/Recreational Activities (#6)). Since many participants reported the same walking activitiy in more than one section, walking was only included from the walking-specific section.
